title: Probability Amplitudes for Charge-Monopole Scattering
abstract: In this letter we quantize a previously proposed non-local lagrangean for the classical dual electrodynamics (Phys.Lett.B 384(1996)197), showing how it can be used to construct probability amplitudes. Our results are shown to agree with those obtained in the context of Schwinger and Zwanzinger formulations, but without necessity of introducing strings.
